channel.title: Trying to move files from gateway to workstation
channel.description:
How can I move my tor data folder from my gateway to workstation or the very least my host machine?
I want to use that folder on another gateway to use the same hidden service address.
I tried adding a shared folder on my kvm but it doesn't show up on my gateway can anyone help?

item.title: Trying to move files from gateway to workstation
item.dc:creator: torjunkie
item.description:
Whonix

Copying files into and out of Whonix Virtual Machines.
